abstract.para: &productname; is a commercial-grade distribution of cloud software, the leading open source cloud computing platform. This &productname; distribution, backed by HPE lets you build, manage, and operate open source-based clouds on a resilient, maintainable platform. &productname; enables cost-effective scalability of IT services and business agility and, as part of the &productname; portfolio, it is backed by a wide range of related cloud products, services, and professional support.
